import React from 'react' import './MainDashboard.css' export default function MainDashboard() { function scrollToSection(id){ const el = document.getElementById(id) if (el) el.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }) } return (

Hostel Hub

Smart Hostel Complaint Management System

A simple and efficient platform for students, wardens and workers to manage hostel complaints with transparency and ease.

About

Hostel Hub helps simplify hostel maintenance by providing a fast, paperless and easy-to-track complaint system.

Features

  • Students can register complaints with images
  • Wardens can accept or reject complaints
  • Workers can update progress and mark tasks completed

Contact

Demo project for hostel management system.

) }
